ROOT.QUERY: SELECT (SELECT sapcexap || '' | '' || saplibl FROM liensecappro@heinens_custom_prod, secappro@heinens_custom_prod WHERE liacinap=sapcinap AND liasite=ecdsite AND liacfin=ecdcfin AND liaccin=ecdccin) "Buyer", ecdcexcde "PO#", ecdsite "Whs", foucnuf || '' | '' || foulibl "Supplier code desc.", to_char(ecddcom,''MM/DD/RRRR'') "Order date", to_char(ecddliv,''MM/DD/RRRR'') "Delivery date", to_char(ecddenvoi,''MM/DD/RRRR'') "Sending date", pkparpostes.get_postvan1@heinens_custom_prod(1,10,917, 12) || '' days prior delivery'' "To warehouse" FROM cdeentcde@heinens_custom_prod, sitdgene@heinens_custom_prod, foudgene@heinens_custom_prod WHERE ecdetat=5 AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM tb_erec@heinens_custom_prod WHERE oe_ncdefo=ecdcexcde) AND ecdsite =socsite AND soccmag=0 AND foucfin=ecdcfin AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM artasent@heinens_custom_prod, cdedetcde@heinens_custom_prod WHERE dcdcincde=ecdcincde AND dcdseqvl=aloseqvl AND alosite=ecdsite AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) BETWEEN aloddeb AND alodfin) AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) > TRUNC(ecddenvoi) AND TRUNC(SYSDATE+pkparpostes.get_postvan1@heinens_custom_prod(1,10,917, 12)) >= ecddliv AND TRUNC(ecddliv)>=TRUNC(SYSDATE)
ROOT.HEADERIFEMPTY: No PO not sent to warehouse
